snippet: The Chinese advertising company went public with the bid, made by several private equity firms, including the Carlyle Group.
abstract: Chinese advertising company Focus Media Holding says it has received a takeover proposal from a group of private equity firms, including the Carlyle Group, in what would be China's largest leveraged buyout.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese advertising company went public with the bid, made by several private equity firms, including the Carlyle Group.

headline.seo: Focus Media of China Weighs Takeover Proposal
headline.main: In Shanghai, Focus Media Weighs Takeover Proposal
headline.print_headline: In Shanghai, Focus Media Weighs Takeover Proposal
